title: Should I buy a violin for less than 200 dollars? - Quora

response.answer_text: If it’s worth much more, of course yes. If it’s not, no. From the vagueness of your question, I suppose you can't judge. The solution is: take your teacher with you. I know my teacher bought for $200 violins that were worth maybe ten times more… but you must be able to tell yourself how much a violin is worth, you must know where to look, have patience and luck.
Yes. Sometimes violin costs more than $200, but make sure you know that the violin is legit and not a frod. Make sure you test it out and is not broken.
